column1: #Text=Chou the Elder says : " What are those filthy peasants doing here ? "
#Text=Big Chou says : " Do n't worry father .
#Text=" Big Chou says : " You 're not getting past us .
#Text=" Wan says : " Grab as much food as you can .
#Text=Maybe we do have the power to change things .
#Text=" Palace guard says : " Stop right there !
#Text=" Jaya says : " Looks like the Chous found backup .
#Text=" Wan says : " Get everyone out of here .
